mapper.insert: insert into CFUTURESDESCRIPTION ( object_id, s_info_windcode, s_info_code, s_info_name, s_info_ename, fs_info_sccode, fs_info_type, fs_info_cctype, s_info_exchmarket, s_info_listdate, s_info_delistdate, fs_info_dlmonth, fs_info_lprice, fs_info_ltdldate, opdate, opmode, imp_date, imp_time ) values ( #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoWindcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsInfoSccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsInfoType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fsInfoCctype,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sInfoExchmarket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoListdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoDelistdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsInfoDlmonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsInfoLprice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fsInfoLtdldate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opmode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{impTime,jdbcType=CHAR} )
